name: The Joy of Creation: Ignited Collection
summary: The Joy of Creation: Ignited Collection is an upcoming bundle developed by Nikson. The collection includes complete remakes of the three The Joy of Creation games, including Classic, Reborn, and Story Mode. All these games will be remade from the ground up, with new assets, new gameplay, etc. The bundle was announced on August 20, 2020 and was estimated to release on 2021 but was delayed due to his contract with Glowstick Entertainment. On April 30, 2022, Nikson confirmed on Discord that he was finally allowed to develop the bundle again.
